# Quickstart Guide

## Setup
1. Clone the repository
2. Install dependencies: `npm install`
3. Start the server: `npm start`

## Usage
- Make POST requests to `http://localhost:3000/api/sell-waste-today`
- See README.md for sample request formats

## Professional Practices
- All edge cases are handled deterministically
- Responses are contract-driven and transparent
- Safety nets ensure operational reliability

For detailed architecture and safety net documentation, see ARCHITECTURE.md and SAFETY_NETS.md.
